Posts.Content: Andrea6664 wrote: hello I am new to this. I was recently diagnosed with fibroadenoma on June 22nd on July 29 where they did the biopsy I have been been feeling pain and the pain has spread to the sided my breast close to my arm pit. I was so worried that I went to the er they told me that the pain I could be feeling were the fibroadenoma enlarging do to hormones. Today I am noticing burning flashes around my armpit down my arm and around my nipple.... I have recently came down with a cold but, I am. Very worried/ scared has anyone experienced this before? My mother in law thinks I'm nuts because she was the one who did my ultra sound and she keeps telling me I am fine and that I'm working my self up Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fibroadenoma Andrea6664 tgoldens
